Class SimAction

java.lang.Object
  yaak.sim.schedule.Action
      yaak.model.SimAction
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class SimAction
extends Action

SimAction is the base simulation action for application-layer operations.

Version:
$Id: SimAction.java 6 2005-06-08 17:00:15Z jsmith $

Jerry Smith

Method Detail

setAgent

public final void setAgent(Agent agent)

Associates an agent with this action.

Parameters:
agent - The agent associated with the simulation action.

execute

public final void execute()

Not for public consumption.

This method performs fundamental actions, as prescribed by executeAction. It also performs domain layer operations, such as event notifications, etc.

Specified by:
execute in class Action

executeAction

protected void executeAction()

Performs fundamental actions with respect to a simulation agent. The simulation application should override this method to implement an action (operations).

addSimActionListener

public final void addSimActionListener(SimActionListener listener)

Registers a listener/observer for simulation action events.

Parameters:
listener - The to-be-registered listener object.
